trans-unit.source: Represents the structure, or schema, of a data field.
trans-unit.target: Representerer strukturen eller skjemaet for et datafelt.

trans-unit.source: Use the DataSetFieldSchema class to get the properties of a data field using a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk DataSetFieldSchema-klasse for å hente egenskaper for et datafelt i <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn>

trans-unit.source: You can discover the structure of a data field by using the following properties in this class: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.DataType%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.IsReadOnly%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.Length%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.Name%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.IsUnique%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan oppdage strukturen i et datafelt ved hjelp av de følgende egenskapene i denne klassen: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.DataType%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.IsReadOnly%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.Length%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.Name%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.IsUnique%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.IsUnique%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.Name%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.Length%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.IsReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.DataType%2A>

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.Identity%2A> property to determine if a data column is set for <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A>, or the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.PrimaryKey%2A> property to determine if a data column is in the primary key.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.Identity%2A>til å fastslå om en datakolonne er angitt for <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A>, eller <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.PrimaryKey%2A>til å fastslå om en datakolonne er i primærnøkkelen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.PrimaryKey%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.Identity%2A>

trans-unit.source: The DataSetFieldSchema class is used by custom control designer components to provide information about a data field at design time.
trans-unit.target: DataSetFieldSchema klassen brukes av egendefinert kontroll designer komponenter for å gi informasjon om et datafelt under utformingen.

trans-unit.source: To examine the components of data using a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, use the following classes.
trans-unit.target: Å undersøke komponentene til data ved hjelp av en <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, bruker du følgende klasser.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetSchema> - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetViewSchema> - DataSetFieldSchema
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetSchema>- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetViewSchema>-DataSetFieldSchema</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetViewSchema> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetSchema>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema"></xref> class using a specified <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av et angitt <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema> class to examine the properties of a data field using a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> object.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema>klassen for å undersøke egenskapene til et felt med en <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>objektet.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref> object that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema"></xref> object describes.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"> </xref> objekt som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema"> </xref> beskriver objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of data stored in the data field.
trans-unit.target: Henter datatypen som er lagret i data-feltet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> object that represents the type of data the data field contains.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>objektet som representerer datatypen data-feltet inneholder.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the value of the data field automatically increments for each new row added to the table or view.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om øker verdien for datafeltet automatisk for hver ny rad som er lagt til i tabellen eller visningen.

trans-unit.source: The Identity property corresponds to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A> property of a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.
trans-unit.target: Identitetsegenskapen tilsvarer <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.DataType*> is numeric and the value of the column increments automatically as new rows are added to the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.DataType*>er numeriske verdien i kolonnen intervaller automatisk som nye rader er lagt til i <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema.DataType*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"> </xref> er skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data field is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis data-feltet er skrivebeskyttet. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether values in the data field are required to be unique.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om verdiene i data-feltet må være unike.

trans-unit.source: The IsUnique property corresponds to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Unique%2A> property of a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen IsUnique tilsvarer <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Unique%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Unique%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if data in the data field is unique; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis dataene i datafeltet er unike. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the size of data that can be stored in the data field.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir størrelsen på dataene som kan lagres i data-feltet.

trans-unit.source: The Length property corresponds to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.MaxLength%2A> property of a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen lengden tilsvarer <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.MaxLength%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.MaxLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes the column can store.
trans-unit.target: Antall byte som kolonnen kan lagres.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the data field.
trans-unit.target: Henter navnet på data-feltet.

trans-unit.source: The Name property corresponds to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> property of a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen Name tilsvarer <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the data field.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på data-feltet.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the data field can accept <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om data-feltet godtar <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The Nullable property corresponds to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AllowDBNull%2A> property of a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen Nullable tilsvarer <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AllowDBNull%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AllowDBNull%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data field can accept <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> values; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis data-feltet godtar <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> verdier; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum number of digits used to represent a numerical value in the data field.
trans-unit.target: Henter maksimalt antall sifre som brukes til å representere en numerisk verdi i data-feltet.

trans-unit.source: The Precision property is required by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceFieldSchema> interface, but is not used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema> class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen Precision kreves av den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceFieldSchema>grensesnittet, men brukes ikke av <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceFieldSchema>

trans-unit.source: This property always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_-1" name="-1" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen returnerer alltid <xref uid="langword_csharp_-1" name="-1" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the data field is in the primary key for the containing table or view.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om datafeltet er i den primære nøkkelen for det inneholdende tabell eller visning.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data field is in the primary key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis data-feltet i primærnøkkel. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of decimal places to which numerical values in the data field are resolved.
trans-unit.target: Henter antall desimaler som numeriske verdier i datafeltet er løst.

trans-unit.source: The Scale property is required by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceFieldSchema> interface, but is not used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema> class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen Scale kreves av den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceFieldSchema>grensesnittet, men brukes ikke av <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSetFieldSchema> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceFieldSchema>

trans-unit.source: This property always returns -1.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen returnerer alltid -1.
